Ask HN: What do you think about my “BeReal, but for video” idea?
text:
Firstly, thanks for actually reading this. I wanted to get the feedback from the HN community to see if it's worth pursuing.

IMO, BeReal would make sense to add video, but they haven't, which leads me to my idea. I've long thought that video should also be utilized for "social" and not only for "media" (TikTok, YT Shorts). I believe that there's an opportunity to create an app revolving around video content that is entirely made up by friends.

The app would work like this: you would open the app and be greeted by the camera, you would then have to upload a video of what you're doing to get access to the feed, and then every 24 hours it get reset. This wouldn't involve a notification telling you to get on, but instead whenever you want to browse the app, you would need to upload a video of whatever you're doing to get access. Now, it could be possible that people will post videos of a black screen to get access, BUT, you would think the same thing for BeReal, yet no one does that. Everyone uses BeReal for its intended purpose.

So what do you think? I'd love any feedback.

Ask HN: Learning Real Estate Investing Through Investor Profiles
text:
For those looking to get into real estate, what's holding you back from making your first/next real estate investment?

I don't expect Hacker News to have a high density of real estate investors (relative to Bigger Pockets or r/RealEstate). But every now and then investment questions pop up, usually regarding the stock market, so I figured real estate deserved a little more love. It's less spoken about because the barrier of entry seems higher and riskier, but as a software engineer with no network in the space who took a random plunge in REI years, it has worked out spectacularly for me.

I'm 28, so no gray hair RE investor wisdom to share exclusively, but I do know others way more experienced than I who would love to share their story and how they scaled their properties over time.

Would folks on HN be interested in reading in-depth profiles about experienced real estate investors? There would be further options to follow up with said investors for high-touch services or guidance if needed as well.

Show HN: AI Generated TikToks and Short Form Video
text:
I’m building a software platform that allows creators to make short form music videos using generative AI.

Here’s an example of a TikTok video I was able to create so far: https://www.tiktok.com/@melodizeai/video/7206561191609716014

I am looking for: - A marketer who deeply understands social media marketing and product marketing to help me develop the brand. - An engineer who wants to help improve the video generation algorithm, - A PM who wants to talk to users to identify the direction of the product

DM @melodizeai on Tiktok if interested!

Ask HN: Fellow Québec residents, what the hell is going on with the SAAQ?
text:
Dear readers,

It appears that our provincial government's equivalent of the DMV has gone completely off the rails.

Apparently they've gone through a "digital transformation" to consolidate and modernize 40-year old IT systems. And the absolute genius project managers running it decided to do things like shut-down services for a whole month and migrate everything at once.

It has gone about as well as you can imagine. Dealerships aren't able to properly register vehicles they've sold. Physical locations have queues with wait times as long as 5-6 hours. Payments made through online banking to renew licences have not been processed. Apparently the recommendation is to keep driving with your expired licence and carry a printed off bank statement showing that you paid. But good luck if you're pulled over, you might still get the fine anyways.

I just can't even comprehension this level of technological backwards-ness and insanity! An all-at-once deployment and losing track of bank transactions? In the 2020s?! How is this even possible?

Sorry. /rant
